references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that bridges image and text understanding, which is foundational to many text-to-image diffusion models discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a highly influential text-to-image diffusion model, which is directly analyzed and built upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion 3, a state-of-the-art model that is analyzed in this paper and demonstrates a sophisticated architecture relevant to the research.

references.paper_title: On mechanistic knowledge localization in text-to-image generative models
references.reason: This paper explores the localization of knowledge within diffusion models, providing related work and context for the current research on precise parameter localization.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion XL, another significant model in the field, which is used for experimentation and comparison in this paper.
